title: New blood test could detect Parkinson’s years before symptoms - Drug Target Review
summary_full: New blood test could detect Parkinson’s years before symptoms  Drug Target Review4 Parkinson’s disease symptoms that can show up decades before a diagnosis  The Washington PostEarly signs of Parkinson's can be identified in the blood  Medical XpressMany people think of a tremor as the quintessential warning sign of Parkinson’s disease. But other symptoms — many of them not involving changes in movement — can appear much earlier. https://wapo.st/4kdPanW  facebook.comAn explainable Ensemble Machine Learning Model Using Baseline Blood Transcriptomics to Predict Parkinson's Disease Motor Progression  Frontiers
